website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular liner showcases supreme day wear from a reliable brand.
pros: Liner lasts up to 12 hours for all-day wear
Does not skip or drag on eyelid
cons: Tends to transfer between top and lower lash lines

website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you like a liquid liner that can draw very fine lines, but keep in mind that you may have to purchase it more frequently than other brands due to its tendency to dry out.
pros: Features a super-thin felt tip that draws precision lines
Pen applicator is easy to grip and control
Dries fast and wears for hours without budging for most wearers
Can draw precision wing tips and other trendy looks
cons: Pen dries out faster than other products on our shortlist
A little awkward to apply if you are use to a thicker brush
Will fade if exposed to sweat or water

customer_reviews.title: OMMM MYYY GOSHHH IM AN EYELINER  FANATIC THIS IS THEE BESTTT
customer_reviews.text: okkkkk laaaadiesss!!! um this is theeee BESTTTT eyeliner everrr ... im hammered drank a few beers.. 🤷🏼‍♀️got my package and was like🤔 oh well imma go try it out any way and i ran🏃🏼 upstairs and primed and powdered my damn eyelids real quick ... ok .. then i drew on THE BOMBEST eyeliner --super quick no feather bleeding problems and perfect tip for that" cut you bitch style" and danggg .. like i seriously love it 😱i am shocked at how black it is and the perfectttt finish ( i hate shiny finish eyeliner) .. i love itttt yayyy
customer_reviews.author: princesspink

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get the look I want with an eyeliner pencil. I had been using a more expensive "felt-tip" type liner but when I saw this product first at Walmart then on Amazon I had to try it. It's GREAT, for me at least. First, the tip is just firm enough without being hard; there is some flexibility. For finer lines I use the tip only. For heavier lines I use it in a more horizontal, laid down position. Secondly, the gray color is dark enough without the harshness of black. I've re-ordered and am trying the brown color. Won't use another eyeliner as long as I can get this one.
customer_reviews.author: teachernomore

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I can’t review whether or not it lives up to its promise because I literally couldn’t get it to go on my eye. I shook it and squeezed the tip and it had product in it but it wouldn’t draw on my eyes. I have used liquid eyeliner for years and was only looking for something different because the one I’ve used for years was discontinued by another brand. This eyeliner is worthless. I guess I am looking for another brand. Don’t bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: UGHHHHhhhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: I've used many liquid eyeliners and this one is BY FAR THE WORST EVER. It will melt off your eyelids and down your face. Part of it will suddenly be gone when you look in the mirror, while the other part is still "infallible". It's much more expensive, but I love Stila. I wouldn't have purchased this but I forgot my Stila at home while away and thought for such a good price and so many good reviews there must be something to it. No. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY FOUND a replacement for the discontinued "Loreal lineur intense Earthen Rock #630".
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy that I FINALLY FOUND a replacement for the discontinued "Loreal lineur intense Earthen Rock #630". My replacement Infallible liquid eyeliner #401 BROWN" is excellent! I've attached a photo to show a thin and thick line i made. In particular I purposely drew the thick line over a wrinkle in my skin to show its ability do not run into the cracks since I am an older gal this is important.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than ANY other Liner. Even the pricey ones.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this liner. I am pretty picky when it comes to my liquid eye liner. I have been using this exact one for a few years now and LOVE it. It makes application really easy and when it comes to doing a wing I am a bit inept but with this I simply lay the full tip on the corner of my eye and then sweep all the way to the corner of my eye and it is perfect 99% of the time. I once purchased Stila's hoping for ... idk somehow even better results or longer lasting and I regret wasting the money. This one WINS EVERYTIME.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M

customer_reviews.title: Runs out QUICK
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brown liner and after 2 uses, I need to put at least 5 coats on each eye to be able to see the brown liner. Not sure why it ran out so fast. I do a very thin line so there's no reason to run out already. I do like the color of the liner, but I need to throw it away already and the price isn't worth less than 5 uses. Wouldn't recommend buying. Perhaps I was mailed an old/expired liner.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: I typically buy an expensive brand liquid eye liner so i wasn't expecting great quality because of the inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so i didn't have to go to the department store. I typically buy an expensive brand liquid eye liner so i wasn't expecting great quality because of the inexpensive price. I was wrong! This product is great. It goes on easy and stays on all day but is easy to remove at night. You only have to use it once. It is a perfect jet black color. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie F.

customer_reviews.title: It is not waterproof and can smudge fairly easily if you touch it
customer_reviews.text: It is not waterproof and can smudge fairly easily if you touch it, but overall I love this eyeliner. It's so easy to apply and make pointy wingtips. This is my favorite eyeliner out of all the ones I've tried. Most liquid eyeliners that give me nice looking wings will irritate my skin, and the ones that don't irritate are too thick or watery and difficult to draw wings with. However, this L'Oreal eyeliner is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: To be clear, I am reviewing the brown felt tip eyeliner. The first thing I noticed was that the point is so long and so very fine that it bends all over the place when you try to line your eyes. So I carefully cut the very bendy tip off at an angle. That worked. Second, when I applied it, sometimes I got a nice dark line and other times it seemed watery or washed out, and I had to keep going over the same place to get the color even. Third, by the beginning of the evening most of it had faded out and I looked like I needed to refresh my makeup. Very disappointing for a L'Oreal product.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Tip dries out
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for sometime now. I really like how this, it works well and I like the smaller tip. However, every time I get it the tip dries out so getting the inner corner of my eye is really difficult. I found some ways around this but every time I I do it I lose extra product. Once I get to the thicker part of my eyeliner though, I have no issues at all. I don’t think that I’ll be getting it again just because of the difficulty getting the inner eye lid, but I am enjoying it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Opened package! Garbage! Was dried out!
customer_reviews.text: This product was opened when I received it. I should have returned it but was anxious to try. Huge mistake! It was dried up and NEVER was I able to get any color out of it. It's ridiculous to pay money for garbage. Sorry that I never took the time to return it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brennann

customer_reviews.title: Very dried tip
customer_reviews.text: This isn't very brown, very close to black. I thought oh ok well I guess its not too bad I can still use it ,but this eyeliner is extremely difficult to apply! The formula isn't all too bad but the tip is very dry so the smallest point on the tip will not be able to give you a sharp line and will require concealer or something to clean it up. I do like felt tips very much and the shape is quite nice but product mostly comes out in the thickest end so it is very easy to mess up and make your liner too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Armendariz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, lasts a full day.
customer_reviews.text: This eye liner is easy to apply, from a fine line to a full cat effect. I like both the color and the density of the color. I find that it is easy to control during application. Despite 95 degree temperatures, the eyeliner stayed in place all day, though it was relatively easy to remove at bedtime. For now, this is my eyeliner of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kymara

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s easier to do a wing with this (I have slightly hooded eyes so it’s a pain) but I can’t get it close enough to my lash line for some reason. Tight lining makes up for it but still kind of annoying. Color payoff isn’t great. It’s like it’s gray and not black. If you go over the same area the product seems to move and defeat the whole purpose, if that makes sense. Maybe I have an old product but it doesn’t seem dried out so I really don’t know. This is the first pen style I’ve used and it’s okay but I’m still looking for my holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Made my eyes and eyelids burn for almost a full day.
customer_reviews.text: Burned my eyes within one minute of putting it on. And not just my eyeballs, people -- I'm talking about the skin all around my eyelids where I applied it. I even tried a second time the next day to see if maybe my eyes just needed to get used to it so I forced myself to keep this stuff on for a half hour until I couldn't take it no more. Eyelids were swollen and red/pink for about 20 hours after I removed this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: SAHK

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I’ve ever used! My go to! Great price for how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner that I’ve ever used. It allows you to easily create flawless winged eyeliner and what I love about the pen is that there is an even distribution of ink along the entire felt applicator from top to bottom. Other brands over time it’ll dry out causing an uneven distribution of ink on the pen tip that creates uneven wings and uneven ink color/intensity along your winged line, but not with this pen! I also have this in black and have used it for over a month and the tip of the pen hasn’t lost its shape- no bent, mashed flat tip.
customer_reviews.author: H C

customer_reviews.title: Dries out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Product does last on eyes but the pen itself dries out disappointingly fast, even when stored upside down. Very difficult to use once parts of the pen have dried, nearly impossible to work fine lines, pen skips like crazy. It’s very meh. Serviceable for my needs, which is daily use, but once it is dry it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: cajunprincess

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner just NOT waterproof or resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof, not water resistant, or even smudge proof. If this wasn't makeup I'd return it. This is a great eye liner pen- it's just NOT waterproof. I've been using it for about a week now and testing it. I really wanted to use it for when I went boating or when its rainy out (Seattle, ya know!).
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Loreal Rip off eye liner.
customer_reviews.text: This product barely lasted for only six or seven very light applications. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great- even for a novice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this liner! Its easy to apply. The tip is very thin. It applies like a mix between a marker and a paint brush - good coverage and easily fixes and skips or unevenness due to being crappy at drawing on eyeliner. Its very forgiving. As a person who hates "liquid" eyeliner in general this liner will keep me from going back to using a pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Meggotron

customer_reviews.title: I like my pencil type twist up liner better, but this was okay quality.
customer_reviews.text: Tickles. I didn't like that I have to use the length of the spongy end to draw on my eyes because the tip sort of runs out of liquid. I am used to pencil type twist up liner. This liner is wet and dries fast so it doesn't blend like pencil types. Where you draw you have it there. I looked like a 60's hooked. Lol I gave it 4 stars because it does what it is supposed to except the drying tip which doesn't stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not for newbies!
customer_reviews.text: It is super hard to get this stuff on straight. If you apply it with minimum pressure it produces a very thin ink pen type line that is nearly impossible to correct. If you use a little pressure you must focus on being 100% consistent across the entire lid, otherwise the line ebbs and flows. Not good for an inexperienced user. On the plus side, it will stay on your eyes FOREVER!
customer_reviews.author: Frecklesotool

customer_reviews.title: Love the gray color
customer_reviews.text: Love the gray color; it’s very professional looking without being stark (like black eyeliner). The applicator is easy to use though the color does bleed a little because of the fine wrinkles on my eyes. My only complaint is that the felt tip kind of dries out of eyeliner during application so I usually do one eye and then have to wait a few minutes to do the other one. I have oily skin so I have to use this with primer in the hotter months. The cons of this liner are so small though. I’m getting ready to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice liner but little product
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner has a nice, flexible tip and good black pigment, but doesn’t last long at all (in terms of amount of product- the liner does generally stay on my eyes all day without fading). It seemed to get faint and then run out within just a few weeks. If it lasted I’d give it 4-5 stars, but I can’t justify the price when there is so little product inside.
customer_reviews.author: BlaireTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using more expensive brands of eyeliner. I noticed that my mascara would always disappear by the end of the day but my mother never had that problem. She told me what she was wearing. It was the liquid and brush form of this. I bought it but have a hard time applying under my eyes. So I went to Walgreens and found this one. I loved it so much that I ordered another one (ready for when the first becomes empty) from Amazon. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: JSCatherine

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If I dint apply concealer, eyeshadow under..and black eyeshadow over it and let it dry it will print into the crease instantly. If you have the patience to let it dry a bit, go over w eye shadow, and be very careful when misting setting spray then it's for you. Goes on so smooth just dries badly also its definitely not water proof even w setting spray. One drop of water and it smears
customer_reviews.author: April Winters

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long at all
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't last long on your face, and the product itself hardly has anything in it to create eyeliner just a short time after purchasing it. I counted on the reviews on this product and another one, and now I see that lots of reviews does not necessarily mean that the product you get will do what the reviews say. Hype? I don't know. I was hoping it was going to work well and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Book person

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. Great price and it works just as good as ones I've bought twice the price. Clean slim lines and its pretty black. Not entirely smudge proof though so if your a face toucher you'll probable accidentally wipe it off. Though it does stay pretty good. I've fallen asleep with it on and woken up with the shadow of the line from the day before so you probably wont have to reapply if it doesnt rain and you don't touch it
customer_reviews.author: Tiawna Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It draws very well but I feel like you have to press kind of hard to get it to come out. I am comparing it to the Stila or Kat Von D liners. Those just kind of flow out more effortlessly. Takes some getting used to but it works pretty well. Wish the tip was finer for a better cat eye. With this one you have to be good at "flicking" it out or its a chubbier line.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bost

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE LINER EVER NO SMEAR. Perfect line!
customer_reviews.text: This is life honey child. This stays on for days and no smudge and its not waterproof you rock!!! Best liner hands down. It will stay on two days no problem. No smear no running! Perfect lines. I adore this liner
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: so far its good
customer_reviews.text: used it once so far so good but does comes off so wen u use it u have to make sure it dry offs all the way nd than open ur eyes or else it will smudge everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Rabia shahbaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this product :)
customer_reviews.text: I traditionally haven't used any type or brand of eyeliner because I don't have a steady hand and it's often hard for me to apply. However, after reading a particularly good review, I decided to try this one and I have been very happy with the results. The color is good, it stays on, and it's very easy to apply. I would recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Marthy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Long handle warning.
customer_reviews.text: I love the liquid eyeliners by L'oreal in general . This one does have the longest stick applicator I've seen and is somewhat uncomfortable for me trying to put it on without poking my eye out. It's 5 1/4" in length. Also, I don't like the top cap part because it doesn't screw on, but pulls out like a pen cap. Not sure how long it'll take for this to dry out, but won't buy it again. Product is good though.
customer_reviews.author: twinkle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This liquid liner really stays in place and application is simple! Mine looks like new and I've had it on for 8 hours so far today. My old one would smudge at my outer creases and make me look like a raccoon. The fine tip is so precise on this, making it easy to cover mistakes or layer for a dramatic effect. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my fading eyesight.
customer_reviews.text: I never leave the house without makeup on. I have macular degeneration, and my eyesight is almost gone completely in my left eye. I have enough sight in my right eye to position the eyeliner over the corner of my eye, and it just glides across to the other edge. I do this for both eyes, and it works out great. Versatile little tip.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: The black eyeliner runs more than any liner I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the brown version of L'Oréal Paris Infallible Super Slim Liquid Eyeliner, and love it so much that I decided to try it in black. Excited to give it a try, I applied it same way I apply the brown - and within minutes it ran horribly. Tried it again today - same thing. Not sure how two products can be so different, but I'm going to stick with the brown from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Yet Another Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye liner. It's matte black and the thin tip makes applying it quick and easy. I haven't had any issues with it drying out. I personally like eye liner that is not water proof, to make removal easier, but when I wash my face at night I still need to use a q-tip to remove the excess eye liner. Probably a plus for people who wear their make up for long periods of time. Regardless, this will continue to be my go-to eye liner.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the gray for older women
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use.`What makes it special for me is the gray color they make. I am over 70 and black or brownish black liners are too bold for a woman of a certain age. The gray is bold enough to emphasize the eyes but not so much that one looks like mutton dressed as lamb. This is not just my opinion. More than one of my peers have asked what eyeliner i am using because it is effective but subtle’
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I got a bad one, but this product does not work. It acts like I have been using it for months and it is starting to dry up. When I go get some eyeliner to come out it is faint and does not stay on. I have never had any issues with eyeliner smudging or wearing off throughout the day, but after about 10-20 min this product starts to come off. 100% NOT WATERPROOF OR SMUDGE PROOF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved it, from application to how durable it is
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars, but as mentioned in another review, it is hard to correct. I absolutely loved it, from application to how durable it is. I was looking for a durable eyeliner that would actually stay and wasn't sure of trying this one. It's great, one time I went to bed with it one (I know we shouldn't, but it was too late and I was tired) and next morning I thought it would be a mess. To my surprise, the eyeliner was almost intact! I was very impressed. Will definitely by again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pino

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I have a oily eyelid problem, and this eyeliner works wonderful. It goes on smooth, lasts all day (8 hours if you don't rub your eyelids) The grey is nice, compliments my blue eyes. Shipped quickly and I got two in my shipment!
customer_reviews.author: Hippie38

customer_reviews.title: A-MA-ZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best liner I've ever bought in this price range. It's almost as good as the Tom Ford one (59$)! The color is dark enough, the longevity is great, but the best part is the application. The tip is firm but soft enough to glide on my 55 years old eyelid. This is my new grail!
customer_reviews.author: Géraldine

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin line
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some new liner; and, the Loreal products always seem to wear well. I couldn't find the style I used to wear; but, these were a good price. The line is very thin; if you want it thicker, reapply. It did not come off in the shower; but, it did smudge when I took a nap. I used strong eye make-up remover to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Nice liner unless you have fine lines
customer_reviews.text: I think younger gals would have better luck but those whose eyelids have fine lines the liner pen jumps, leaving gaps in coverage. So far, super hero eyeliner by IT works best for fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Kittypaws63

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buying this as my regular eye liner from now on. It goes on so easily and is so much darker than I thought it would be. A lot of times when I buy black eye liner it is super light and you have to apply it a few times for it to look good. This one is the exact black I was looking for. Be careful though, it isn't waterproof so if you have a particularly bad day at the office you might need to bring it to reapply :)
customer_reviews.author: Pedi RN

customer_reviews.title: Too dark, didn't go on easily, wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a Brown-black then brown and it doesn't not glide on easily like the other brand I bought to compare. That other one is black and these two colors side by side are almost identical which is why I say it's more of a brow-black. Wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've never successfully done winged eyeliner until now. This pen is amazing. It's easy to use, even if you don't have a steady hand (I definitely don't), goes on smoothly, and stays on all day. I draw the line, apply eyeshadow to my lids, and then go over the line one more time. I liked it so much that I've stocked up on brown and also bought black and gray.
customer_reviews.author: ElisaQ

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing this as I type...very nice, long tip brush that makes nice crisp points to my eyeliner application. I have been looking for brown since it makes my eye features slightly softer than the black liners. This does it for me and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tvesi

customer_reviews.title: A bit better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best "budget" liquid eyeliner I've purchased to date. I think I've realized at this point that no eyeliner is going to stay how I want it to unless I drop the big bucks, but it does manage to last at least 6-8 hours through the work day. I usually reapply at night if I'm going somewhere. The tip is very fine and it makes it very easy to tight-line and get that perfect wing. Good choice on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Tricky application but great staying power
customer_reviews.text: I've only used pencil liners before, so the precise, sharp line took a little getting used to. You can smudge it a bit with your fingertip to effect a more smokey look. I previously only used pencil liners, so there was a bit of a learning curve to applying this product. It doesn't stay put on my lower waterline, but otherwise I was impressed by its longevity. Only a slight amount ended up on my upper eyelids/under my eyes, even through wearing it overnight.
customer_reviews.author: equinescholar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with a waterproof primer and it survived super happy tears with no smudging or streaking. Love this eyeliner, it's pretty beginner friendly (I have minimal skills), and didn't irritate my sensitive skin. Wiped off clean with micellar water.
customer_reviews.author: Keller

customer_reviews.title: super nice wing precision!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of "marker" styled liquid liners. I naturally have oily eyelids and in the past have had trouble finding liquid liners that don't Crack or dry out quick even when using a primer. Marker liquid liners really make my morning makeup routine a lot faster. I've been using loreal blackbuster forever and I've just tried the super slim the past few days and it makes my cat eyes so much more precise and it stays even when my eyes get watery in the corners. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: alyce702

customer_reviews.title: Used to be amazing, now somewhat dried out even when brand new
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite eyeliner. It made wings so easy to do. The last three times I have purchased it they seem dried out where I have to spend three times amount of time as I used to just to get it to work. It used to flow out perfectly, not anymore. I'm going to have to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Dried out- useless
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Either this is old or a fake. Even after shaking to distribute the product, it was dry after the FIRST use and has virtually no color. Tried it a couple more times and had to throw it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: It looks black
customer_reviews.text: It's such a dark brown it appears black. You can't line with the tip you have to use the middle of pen which is super annoying. It also lasts around 2-3 hours before it starts looking terrible. I want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it was pretty dry when i received in mail:(
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof , smudge proof or long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite disappointed with this product. I expected it to last through sweat, tears and whatever else. It doesn’t even hold up to my eyes watering. Will not buy again. Would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: ANB

customer_reviews.title: Applies very well but fades
customer_reviews.text: It always applies super well! But it fades off fast. I had just applied it several times before leaving the house and you can already see it fading.
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYELINER EVERRR
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this brand of makeup, so thought I'd try this eyeliner. I'VE NEVER BEEN SO EXCITED TO PUT ON MAKEUP! This goes on sooo easily, and it makes cat eyes a BREEZE! I always struggled with keeping eyeliner on all day, but this one blew me away. Stays in place, goes on SO Easily, and it's the best eye liner I've ever used. I'll only buy this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fades, transfers, inconsistent. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This did not meet my expectations in any way. Upon application it transfers to the hood of my eye. It doesn’t matter what I try, somehow it transfers. Also it’s terribly faded with 4 hours and gone by 8. Claims are a lie there. The flow isnonconstent regardless of how you store it. I always store it the same and the flow goes from nothing to a fat line and then nothing again. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Turner

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is pain, right?
customer_reviews.text: This color looks really good. For perspective, I have dark brown hair, green eyes, and pale, freckled skin. However, I also wear contacts and if I wear this eyeliner too long, little strings of it come loose and float under the lower lids of my eyes. My contacts have not been damaged, but it's never fun to pick out strings of eyeliner paint from my eyeball.
customer_reviews.author: Maree LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I have used for easy application
customer_reviews.text: I love the velvet eyeliner. You need to be careful when first putting it on or it will rub onto your brow, but once it dries a few seconds it is fine. It glides on great and last most of the day. If I am going out at night I will apply another layer just to keep it fresh. It is the best I have found for doing interesting things with your eyes. Drawing a cat eye is a breeze with this eyeliner. When it is getting a little low I recommend buying a new one for going out at night makeup and use the old one for day makeup until it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: KristenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the job!
customer_reviews.text: A quick, simple cat eye is pretty much essential to my typical makeup look. I’m also an artist, so I use tons of tools and understand how crucial they are to the finished product. That being said, this eyeliner does it! It goes on smooth and solid, and I haven’t noticed a decline in the performance or any fuzzing at the tip. I don’t have to go over it multiple times to get a lasting color. I’ve pretty much bounced around between brands for a good 5 years, but I think I’ve found my go-to :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It goes on easily and there's no ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a handful of times but so far, I love it. It goes on easily and there's no difficulty applying on the bottom as is the case with some eyeliners (why? I do not understand how this is a thing). It also goes on with a solid line which is a plus as some eyeliners don't have consistent color from the top line through the bottom. I've tried Design Concepts, Stila and ELF.... so far, this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V.

customer_reviews.title: Very precise
customer_reviews.text: The applicator seems a bit dry but it covers well and is very precise. Lasts through the day. Most importantly it does NOT irritate my eyes. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitzi

customer_reviews.title: Loreal eye liner
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase my makeup in a store. However, with COVID I purchased some makeup on Amazon. This liner was completely dry when I opened the package. Although, it was purchased in April -- I did not open package until recently. Completely dry as some of the reviews did advise.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nardiello

customer_reviews.title: It does the job I need it for!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this twice now, once in brown and the other in black. I use this one as a touch up to my other liquid eyeliner. It does really well smoothing out the lines and correcting mistakes. I wouldn't use it alone though. It's not thick or durable enough. It will fade just after an hour or two and it's pretty light.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is not a smooth, sleek, easy to apply liquid liner. The tip is very hard and definitely not flexible or moist enough to achieve a quick easy wing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fine lines
customer_reviews.text: A bit smudgey if you touch it. I bought it at a recommendation from my sister. Application is smooth, lines are crisp, touch-up is simple. Felt-like marker tip makes beautiful fine lines. I've been using it for a couple months and still havent had problems with drying out or tip deterioration. I have and will recommend it to others as well as repurchase when out.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: ... say the products they received from Amazon didn't seem like the same formulation
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviewers say the products they received from Amazon didn't seem like the same formulation, but mine seemed spot on, if not even better than the last one I bought in store. This is the only makeup I keep rebuying (instead of experimenting with other brands). For what it's worth, my sister gave me a Kat Von D felt tip eyeliner which may have had a bit more staying power/harder to get off, but I like the length and firmness of the felt tip on the loreal one better; it's a lot easier to just "stamp" a cat eye on with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the first time I purchased this product. It’s excellent. I love the thin and delicate line it makes. My eyes become much more beautiful after applying it. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: I found this easy to use and I am notoriously crap at eyeliner, most especially liquid liners. This held up well for me, without smudging or flaking, even through watery eyes during oak pollen season. The color is a black-brown, very dark.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Dries out
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this eyeliner for a little over 2 weeks now and its already drying out. I dont know if maybe it was old when I bought it but I've never had an eyeliner dry out this fast. Was nice when it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Casanova

customer_reviews.title: awesome product. I've never been able to use a ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. I've never been able to use a liquid line due to my oily eyelids. Its stays on all day. I also wear contacts, no irritation. It does sting if it gets in your eyes...when you wash it off for example so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This liner is better than a liquid, but better than a stick also! Somehow, this is like a thin-tipped pen for your eyes. I purchased a more expensive liquid liner from Sephora (Sephora brand) not too long ago. I spent about $15 on that liner. It was smudgy and always left a crease on my eyelid throughout the day! The L'Oreal Super Slim Liner dries extremely quickly, which helps to avoid that creasy mess! Also, it goes on very smooth. I cannot explain how much this solves my makeup problems! Whether you are looking to very thinly line your eyes, or are looking for more of a large swiped Amy Winehouse type of look, you MUST try this! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Comes off during the day
customer_reviews.text: The felt tip was dry and skips ... not smooth and saturated as I'd expected. By lunchtime, the liner has faded, and you can barely tell it's there around 3 p.m. Also, even with primer on, the eyeliner came right off the first time I cried (it's been a sad week).
customer_reviews.author: Bonni Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different eyeliners and this is by far my favorite. It is easy to use to get that cat eye and it stays put. It also does not cake on my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make my eyes itch.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the dark brown and it makes my eyes itch. The grey doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: AR Pease

customer_reviews.title: Not smudge proof at all
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of believing the smudge-proof promises. It looked good when I put it on. An hour later at work I saw myself in the mirror and the liner was smudged a over.
customer_reviews.author: Cammyd

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly decent for the price but my major issue with it is, it is NOT waterproof. My eyes typically water throughout the day and even after a decent amount of drying time (at least an hour) this still comes off really easy. However, this product is easy to use and might work well with setting spray but I will not be purchasing this again as it does not do as it was advertised as doing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Cap pops off for no reason!
customer_reviews.text: Cap pops off all the time, there's no way to get it to stay better. The first one got all over my backpack and stuff, and obviously was then contaminated, then the second one got bumped into the sink, and the cap popped off, and a bunch of sink water contaminated it! I only got 10 uses out of the two. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not for watery eyes
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say that it’s fallible, but it doesn’t work for me. And yet I keep trying it. I really wanted to like this. My eyes water when applying so I thought that a water proof eyeliner should work. It doesn’t stay on pass blinking.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia @fit4apear

customer_reviews.title: Good liner, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The good: Applicator is great! I get an even line very easily with this liner and the black is pretty intense. The bad: Staying power could be better. I feel like I get a little run off by the end of the day. Also the cap comes off VERY easily. I’ve opened my makeup bag to find this liner open and leaking ink everywhere upon many occasions. For this reason alone, I probably won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen G.

customer_reviews.title: Precise and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to eyeliner. The pencil tip is thin and precise enough to use especially if you don't want to put too much eyeliner on. It is long lasting and a nice dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantis

customer_reviews.title: Not very smudge-proof
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good eyeliner and nice thin felt tip applicator, but it smudges relatively easily for a liquid liner. I wouldn't have guessed it was supposed to be water-proof and smudge-proof, although personally I like for my eyeliner to be easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good eyeliner overall. The applicator makes it very easy to apply and you can make your lines thin or thick as desired. I took away one star because the actual liquid eyeliner is not very durable and gets wiped away fairly easily, especially when applied over eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for eyebrow details
customer_reviews.text: I initially got this for fake freckles but started using it for eyebrow details and it works perfectly! Lasts longer than my ABH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I must have received a defective pen. I usually love the liner. It goes on so smoothly and perfectly. This pen doesn’t even release anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lora joy

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I gave it an extra star because it's nearly impossible to find gray color. Black is too harsh on me and brown reads red with my coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Chantooz

customer_reviews.title: DISLIKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked good on my very first use, and after the first one the color did NOT show up whatsoever. I actually bought this product a while back at walgreens and I had the same problem; thought maybe it was a defective product. I bought this recently again and its worse than before. Never buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: Grace Park

customer_reviews.title: ... originally used pencil eyeliner and thought it would be nice to transition to liquid because it seemed more smudge/blur ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally used pencil eyeliner and thought it would be nice to transition to liquid because it seemed more smudge/blur proof. I got the brown color because I like more natural looks than dramatic black liner. This definitely works well for the wing, it has a nice fine tip, but my pen doesn't draw at the very top. This might be a personal issue, though, because the other parts of the pen tip draw great...except for the very very top/tip. I've switched back to pencil liner and will be saving this for formal events because it just takes too long without a working tip.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Application ease
customer_reviews.text: I never used this brand of eyeliner. It may have been defective because I could never get the tip to work. It seemed to be dried out. I've had other brands that worked better like Avon.
customer_reviews.author: Lin in AZ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LISTEN TO POSITIVE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. It felt very dried out and barely went onto my eye. The tip is soft in a very weird spot which makes it hard to control at the oddest points. I love finding new eyeliners and I saw a few bad reviews on this one but saw mostly positive so I tried it and it's worthless. I never write reviews but this was awful and they don't even have returns EVEN THOUGH IT'S A FAULTY PRODUCT. Don't expect it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie Sweeting

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pigmentation. Looks like worn off liquid liner as soon as it’s applied. :( disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Wears off easily on me
customer_reviews.text: Wears off easily on me... it's dark which I love but it just doesn't stay on me and it's wet (gotta wait for it to dry). I prefer physicians formula's liner, not as dark but stays on great! Plus this one kind of irritated my eyes.. I have very sensitive eyes so I'll stick to my PF!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Possibly too old
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted a month, then completely dry, even after shaking and always storing vertically. A disappointment because this is an awesome product I had used in the past...until the stores stopped selling it. It is a soft gray. The applicator is just the right size. Shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Freddi Scharf

customer_reviews.title: God awful.
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is terrible. It smudges if I look at it wrong. And may whatever god you worship help you should it start to rain with this eyeliner on...Also the applicator dries out after useing a spot for prolonged periods during application.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Dried up!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this same liner in black that I purchased at my local drug store. Loved it. Was excited to see it on Amazon in brown but when I received it, it was dried up. Can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: My new go to eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is now my go to eye liner. It is a great liquid eyeliner for beginners. It stays on forever and once it's dry and if your face isn't oily, it doesn't smudge much.
customer_reviews.author: Becca R

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Makeup Infallible Super Slim Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeliner, Ultra-Fine Felt Tip, Quick Drying Formula, Glides on Smoothly, Black, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Color:BlackCreate sleek and sophisticated eye designs. The 0.4mm ultra-fine felt tip of Infallible The Super Slim gives you total control, delivering the perfect amount of liner. The intense quick dry up to 12HR formula glides on smoothly with continuous and even flow. Skip-proof, drag-proof and smudge-proof. Packaging May Vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site. Ultra-Fine Felt Tip Liquid Eyeliner, Intense, Quick-dry Formula, Flawlessly Precise Lines, Smudge-proof, Up to 12HR Apply along the top and bottom lash line beginning in the inner corner of the eye and working outward. Warning: Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetic eye applicators can lead to eye damage, and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.
feature_bullets: SUPER SLIM LIQUID EYELINER: The Super Slim longwear ultra fine tip liquid eyeliner gives you total control for precise lines that last up to 12 hour. Create a sleek sophisticated look with this 0.4 millimeter eyeliner pen

FELT TIP LIQUID EYELINER PEN: With an ultra fine felt tip, this longwear eye liner glides on smoothly with continuous and even flow. Skip proof, drag proof and smudge proof, and stays for up to 12 hour of wear

CREATE YOUR PERFECT EYE MAKEUP LOOK with our collection of Voluminous mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge proof eyeliner, define your brows and discover eye shadow palettes with shades made for every eye color

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eye shadow palettes, lipsticks and much more
PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: Voluminous Original Volume Building Mascara, uniquely formulated to resist clumping, soften & build lashes up to 5X their natural thickness

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
